sentence.text: Given the lack of specific targeted genes and pathways known to be involved in tumour cell dormancy, we proposed enriched candidate genes related to the negative regulation of cell proliferation, signalling pathways regulating pluripotency of stem cells and neuroactive ligand-receptor interaction, and 3 hub genes (intracellular sequestering of iron ion, G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
